Package org.apache.polygene.api.unitofwork

UnitOfWork API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ToEntityConverter
    MetaInfo holder for value-to-entity conversion in UnitOfWork.toEntity(Class, HasIdentity).
    ToValueConverter
    MetaInfo holder for entity-to-value conversion in UnitOfWork.toValue(Class, HasIdentity) The implementation of this interface should be registered as metaInfo on the Usecase of the UnitOfWork where the conversion should take place.
    UnitOfWork
    All operations on entities goes through an UnitOfWork.
    UnitOfWorkCallback
    Callback interface for UnitOfWork completion or discard.
    UnitOfWorkFactory
    Factory for UnitOfWork.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UnitOfWorkOptions
    Set instances of this in MetaInfo on UnitOfWork or the associated Usecase.
    UnitOfWorkTemplate<RESULT,ThrowableType extends Throwable>
    UnitOfWork Template.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UnitOfWorkCallback.UnitOfWorkStatus  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConcurrentEntityModificationException
    This exception is thrown by UnitOfWork.complete() if any entities that are being committed had been changed while the UnitOfWork was being executed.
    EntityCompositeAlreadyExistsException
    If you try to create an EntityComposite whose reference already exists, then this exception will be thrown.
    NoSuchEntityException
    This exception indicates that the requested Entity with the given reference does not exist.
    NoSuchEntityTypeException
    Polygene exception to be thrown in case that an entity composite was not found during a lookup call.
    UnitOfWorkCompletionException
    When an attempt to UnitOfWork.complete() an UnitOfWork fails, this exception will be thrown.
    UnitOfWorkException
    Base Exception for UnitOfWork related concerns.

Package org.apache.polygene.api.unitofwork Description

UnitOfWork API.
